creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture
description: 3/4 profile of woman wrapped in rich, red coat with vibrant white wisteria design with gray and beige ornamentation; pastel colored inner folds with green floral decoration; black cloth over hands; ornate hairpiece; white and blue parasol is held over her head at R by unseen attendant
marks: Signature and Seal LRC: [ 鳥文斎栄之筆 ] (Chobunsai Eishi hitsu)
title: Courtesan at a Parade
